lessonGuidance: The pattern pictured is a little harder to spot and is known as the 1>2<1
First looking at the pink cells they border a one guaranteeing a maximum of one mine
Next looking at the orange cells they also border a one guaranteeing a maximum of one mine
Now looking at the two guarantees that there must be mines present in both the pink and orange
This allows you to clear all other cells bordering the two ones mentioned before

instructions: Using the information about the pattern you just learned, CLEAR each tile that you know 100% is not a mine going from top left to bottom right of the board. Click the "Next" button at the bottom right of your screen when you are done.
